about_the_game:
Overview:
Welcome to Dino Girls, a charming and addictive idle game where you step into the world of paleontology with a unique twist! Collect, nurture, and befriend adorable Dino Girls—cute dinosaur-human hybrids—as you build and manage a personalized resort just for them. Your goal is to create the ultimate paradise where these prehistoric cuties can thrive, and by upgrading your resort, you’ll unlock new features, progress through the game, and uncover the secrets of their ancient world.

Gameplay:
In Dino Girls, you’ll start with a small, basic resort and a single Dino Girl. As you collect resources and expand your resort, you’ll attract more Dino Girls, each with their own unique personalities, abilities, and prehistoric origins. Customize your resort with decorations, facilities, and upgrades to keep your Dino Girls happy and productive. The happier they are, the more resources they’ll generate, helping you progress further and unlock rare Dino Girls and powerful upgrades.

Key Features:

  • Collect Cute Dino Girls:
Discover and collect a wide variety of Dino Girls, from the fierce T-Rex to the gentle Brachiosaurus, each with their own unique traits and skills.

  • Build and Customize Your Resort:
Design and expand your resort with unique buildings, decorations, and facilities to create the perfect home for your Dino Girls.

  • Idle Progression:
Even when you’re offline, your Dino Girls will continue to gather resources and improve your resort, making it easy to jump back in and keep progressing.

  • Upgrade and Evolve:
Unlock powerful upgrades and evolve your Dino Girls to make them even more efficient and unlock special abilities.

  • Explore the Prehistoric World:
Uncover the mysteries of the ancient world as you progress, with new areas, challenges, and rare Dino Girls waiting to be discovered.

Why You’ll Love It:
Dino Girls combines the relaxing fun of idle gameplay with the excitement of collecting and customizing. Whether you’re a fan of dinosaurs, cute characters, or management games, Dino Girls offers a unique and engaging experience that will keep you coming back for more. Build your dream resort, befriend adorable Dino Girls, and uncover the secrets of their prehistoric world in this delightful desktop idle game!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: 2,6 GHz Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

name: Dino Girls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 @ 3.2 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

short_description: Discover and collect cute Dino Girls, organize their activities, and expand your resort while going about your daily stuff.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese
